replace.originalText: Target player gains X life, or prevent X damage to any creature or player.

Banding when attacking
Whenever a wall blocks Battering Ram, destroy that creature at end of combat.
Swampwalk
{1}: Prevent all damage to you from one black source. Further damage from that source is treated normally.
{1}: Prevent all damage to you from one red source. Further damage from that source is treated normally.
During enchanted land's controller's upkeep, Cursed Land deals 1 damage to the player.
Bury target artifact with casting cost equal to X. Detonate deals X damage to that artifact's controller.
Disintegrate deals X damage to target creature or player. That creature cannot regenerate until end of turn. If the creature is dealt lethal damage this turn, remove it from the game.
Elven Riders cannot be blocked except by creatures with flying or walls.
All artifacts in play gain "During your upkeep, pay an additional {2} or bury this artifact."
During enchanted enchantment's controller's upkeep, Feedback deals 1 damage to that player.
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, round down, among any number of target creatures and/or players. Pay an additional {1} for each target beyond the first.
Target player gains 3 life, or prevent up to 3 damage to any creature or player.
Ironclaw Orcs cannot be assigned to block any creature with power 2 or greater.
{4}, {T}: Draw a card.
Banding, flying
If Murk Dwellers attacks and is not blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of combat.

Counter target spell unless that spell's caster pays an additional {X}. That player draws and pays all available mana from lands and mana pool until {X} is paid; he or she may also draw and pay mana from other sources if desired.
Put target creature card from your graveyard into your hand.
All damage dealt to you frmo one source this turn is retroactively added to your life total instead of subtracted from it. Further damage from that source is treated normally.
Tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
Search your library for a basic land card and put it into play. Shuffle your library afterwards.
{B}: Regenerate
During enchanted artifact's controller's upkeep, Warp Artifact deals 1 damage to that player.
Enchanted creature gets -2/-1.

Protection from black
At the end of any turn in which Whirling Dervish damaged any opponent, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Tap X target creatures. Winter Blast deals 2 damage to each of those creatures with flying.
